segments.text: I glance into this cozy kitchen and notice the woman carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a simple dress, looking so focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is right there beside her, but something seems off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet and overflowing everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge and forming a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in it, but she doesn't even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks really wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies with one hand while holding a plate in the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, reaching up as if begging for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, and the mom has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks peaceful and green.
segments.speaker: PAR
